content: as if this only has 10k downloads, what a wicked game. its a game where you can play a dungeon for 15 minutes and leave it alone once you get back to town. theres pop culture references coming out of its hole, its just a nice chill amusing game over all.
Awesome, luv it! Challenging but thats what makes it great

Played for an hour, got to the first boss, died, and ended up at the title screen like I'd never even played at all... Very frustrating to accomplish absolutely nothing in the first hour of game play. Uninstalled.

Overall a great game, but losing that much progress due to poor balancing gets old.... winning even one round is nearly impossible....random events cause one to lose hours of progress with no way around them....lost my 30th round with no win in sight because(my roommate watched it happen) THE GAME KILLED ME OFF AGAIN....full health with no effects active, and the boss hit TWICE... Killed TWO out of three the next round
Great game. If you could go out and level up just randomly walking around, that would be amazing. The quests are fun, but I love leveling up.

RN Jesus is this games bread and butter. The only thing that makes this game difficult is the inability to switch items in combat, the stats not reflecting weapons, and the stupid idea to have the game constantly auto rotate even if your phone has that mode turned off.

Fantastic rogue like! Don't listen to the haters looking for a rogue lite, this is how it used to be. Each run is unique and you win or lose on your own choices. The random events spice things up and the dungeons are varied. Some of the information should be clearer (the math behind weapon damage is there but very hard to see), but overall it's a great number crunching, turn based RPG.

I think it is really good but there are two very annoying things stopping me from playing! Please try to update these small changes so the game can be more enjoyable and less annoying, otherwise it seems so far the game is v good! The music is way too quiet for me. Even at my graveyard shift, I have to have the game full blast to hear, and at hone with my ac, i cant really hear it at all! The second annoyance is the screen doesnt lock in rotation, so playing in bed is hard. Pls menu options<3
Ruined by stupid mechanics, lost a party member, inventory is full, cannot leave dungeon, or continue forward. If you have to buy this game, don't do it.
Lack of disabling auto rotate ruins this game.
Great game overall. If anything just for the replay value alone. Its really quite hard and the more you struggle the more you'll like it. If your a fan of bit art, then this is for you.
Awesome game
â­â­â­â­â­ Still fun to play till this day.

Great game but Im stuck with 1 enemies,he just keep healing him self 28 hp while im only have 2 heroes left 1 only can heal,1 can attack but only can damage the enemy 21 damage No ending And pls add lock rotation ,i cant play this while im in sleep position
No update since 2015. Save your money it's a very dull RPG, there is not excitement or thinking and story is plain.
Stop looking, this is it.
I've had this game before, and it is fun to play. I especially like the histories of each character, and it is challenging and exciting.
Great little game. No ads or in game purchases just one up front cost. Fun game overall but doesn't have too much replay value and can be a bit dull by the 15-16th playthrough.
Great game ðŸ‘ðŸ‘Œ, it's full of action and I'm never bored
Fun but hard and hilarious
Very fun with good replay value. Pixel heroes is a great game for pickup and play, or small binge sessions. Devs: great job on this one, please tell me you're working on a part 2? :)
Not good for full screen on newer phones like one plus
Simple and Boring. Wanted to like it as a fan of rpg, roguelike, and turn based strategy. But it's too repetitive and your quickly bogged down with mediocre items.
Beautiful!
good game but not enough slots in inventory
god i love it
Great game. I enjoy these style alot. I notice some comments are wrong.
Great! Now waiting for Pixel Heroes 2 ðŸ˜
Great game for the price while on sale, have not regretted the purchase.
Graphics and game play better than fallout76
Great game. hard game..... but a very rewarding game
Nerds!!!

A gem amongst games. Note that dying is very much part of the game. The RNG can be cruel, but rarely have I found it impossible to deal with. The refrences scattered in the game made me smile. It can be played without connecting to the internet. A big win combined with the pixel art style. (I will admit now that I am biased in favor of classic pixel art, having grown up with games such as Monkey Island and Kings Quest.) It is challanging, yet you can by pass the RNG if you pay attention. Made much easier as you play, lose, and learn the dungeons. (Online guides help also if you are so inclined.) Bottom line however is death is going to happen. Don't get attached. The replay value lies in pushing your limits and testing new combinations. Since the flow of the game is the same on all three levels of difficulty, you may not enjoy the game if you require the game itself to provide the variations. My only gripe of worth is the annoyance of the auto orientation. Makes it tricky to play while laying down if the game auto adjusts to a portrait view rather then landscape view.
as frustrating as banging ur face into the wall... would not recommend, ugh

loading game or the first time and it's just stuck on "loading" for the 
last 10 minutes. just going to hit refund at this point

Unfair, difficulty would mean that it would be a rough road ahead in a game like this. No. This game has a great concept and is fine everywhere else but I refuse to give it full praise because it is just another unbalanced game trying the to hide behind the Difficulty excuse. Some runs are not possible to complete. Meaning force failure. Force Failure is pathetic game design and selfish of game developers to waste the time of the player just to get to the point where you realize that there is nothing that is humanly possible that could have been done to make victory an option. That is never proper design and is the equivilant of getting swindled by a corner con artist. Don't buy it.

Game is great and I am more then willing to give you 5 stars but even after it says it saves, I have to come back and start over like nothing ever is  saved. Cemetery is always empty also and continue button is blacked out.
It's nostalgic feeling and no micro transaction *cough*EA*cough*

A fun little party crawler that is good for killing time with. Though a lot of the characters begin locked, the game is still just as fun to play.   A guide or walkthrough may be required to adequately win though - or just recording a list of strengths and weaknesses for each area you might visit and enemy you encounter.  At the start of each run you can re-roll your heroes if you don't like who is available. While re-rolls are initially limited, they will become 'unlimited' at some point.
Love it im Old-school RPG brings back good 80s memories
A game that redefines the word bossman. Thank you for the challenge. Love you and hate you all at the same time.
After paying for the game it would not load and run on my tablet.  I sat for nearly an hour without any success.

I bought and installed last night.  My device got stuck on the loading screen every time, so I uninstalled and got a refund.  I just tried again: same problem, but now I can't refund.  I apologize for the 1 star, but I can't play your game and I'm out $7+.  Dell Venue 8740.
Best turn based rpg I've found on android. Exactly what I wanted.
I need more levels, items and heros.
It's too short
Perfect
stuck on loading screen.Zenfone 2 deluxe special edition
Doesn't pass the loading screen on my Asus ZenPad so I can't play the game at all :-(

Although I normally don't like roguelikes this one is pretty nice - but there are some problems: inventory size (just 18 slots (you have both potions anyway) when you get 30-40 items from a dungeon - it's impossible to keep multiple armors for different dungeons/enemies without crippling yourself. There should be an option to take potions in fight (with less effect) and a potion to remove status effects so that you are not that limited in your party setup
Love it for its retro appeal and quirky humor. Very addictive.

I bought this lovely game a year ago and on my first attempt I failed miserably in the first dungeon. I uninstalled and didn't touch it again till today. I played the entire day on the first difficulty (hard) and reached the final dungeon, 3 rooms before the last boss I died! I don't regret any second spent on it, because what an experience! I'd suggest this to any rpg fans, it's got everything.
Pay me back. Stuck on loading screen :((
1 extra star for some references, but the gameplay is meh

Hard as hell. Starting out you are able to pick from 6 random classes for 3 slots. you unlock a variety of quality and curiosity as you beat SPECIFIC dungeons or if you beat more than X dungeons before your guaranteed Total Party Wipe. Robust mechanics system makes for varied and interesting combat and other challenges, which can sometimes  aid or hinder in massive ways, which makes your initial choice of Class NPC selection even more important
The stats on the left on the heroes in the Tavern at start of the game is how their pts will be allocated on each lvl up so if u want a healer pick a hero wit 5 or 4 FAI points
Keep up da good work.
Addicting and very fun. Hoping for a sequel!
Lots of nerd references tied into the story. Tons of characters and party customizations that will keep you playing for hours.
Game stalled and failed to run even after re-installing. Contacted the support email address 3 weeks ago, no reply. May be very good but can't recommend as didn't work and support nonexistent.
Strange until I grasped it, after which is magic. Update: I can't stop playing since 3 days, hope it doesn't ruin my life :)
Can be very challenging at times. Great time waster

Coming from someone who's beat this game: The character selection process is rediculous; So many choices but very few are even useful. You can learn all you want about the dungeons as you go along but never be able to use anything you know because items drop randomly and you can't store them anywhere so it doesn't matter how tactful you are; having the right tools is a roll of the dice. It's a glorified game of dice: No strategy involved. If you try to play smart, you're only going to be beat by chance.
Bought this yesterday because I though it looked really good, installed, started and it's still loading apparently lol ^^  I have tried several times but always have the same result unfortunately.

Thia game is really fun, and it os challenging at times. Just be prepared with your items to prevent status effects and do more damage, and you will be fine! The only problem I have is that there is not a way to lock your screen.
I give it a five, but there needs to be more than just walking to dungeon clearing 8rooms, then goin back to the same town with the same people
Please patch so this game works on the ASUS Zenfone 2. This game looks fun, but it freezes at the loading screen after I choose what resolution I want to play in.
Stuck on load screen
This game is great for short term or extended play. Best of all (unlike most games) they don't want access to your entire phone to play. A definite bonus.
But i feel like its almost hard and more frustrating to fight my phone because of the automatic turning of the screen.  If i want to turn the screen i can turn on screen rotation. Fix? Maybe?
Dont know why. After i choose the language and fit to screen it stays on loading :(
Love this game it takes me back to dos days playing on pc.

A very fun game. As others said there is a learning curve (I am still stuck in that curve ) but the more you play and learn the more you'll enjoy it. Developers- please, PLEASE, allow the screen rotation to lock then I will change to 5 stars
Honestly love it, keep up the good work
Very difficult and no real incentive to continue

Doesnt forgive. Expects you not to suck. In order to advance, set up complementary parties (tank, heals,dps) and look for eq that grants inmmunities. Research the enemies in each dungeon and get resis to their element and use weapons, skills, & spells that they are weak against. First u survive one dungeon, then you start to buildxp and gear, then it is ez.
Great stuff!
Tons of replay value
A lot of good things, like no iap bs and good sense of humor. The only thing annoys me is auto rotation. Please provide a landscape only mode and I'll rise my reading to 5-star.

Great game and refreshing that there are no micro transactions. I would have played double. My only complaint is that the rotation does not stick with the OS's setting. I love that it can be played landscape or portrait, but I wish there was a toggle to lock it in place. Lying in bed and trying to play is frustrating.
I bought this game because the video was amazing, and the game is even better!!!
It's a little confusing in beginning but once you star playing more the game becomes amazing. Fully recommended
So worth it
Can you make an option to lock the screen one way or the other its worth two stars!
Yes it is difficult but why make it easy? Trying to get the perfect combination of characters to assist one another is enjoyable and challenging!
I've tried launching it over and over but nothing

The game is a retro styled turn based rpg, beautifully done and brutal at times, but easy games are never fun, this game isn't hard by any means but it becomes slowly less forgiving as you progress, basicly a learning curve for those expecting a free ride to victory. Well worth its price.
Took a tiny bit of time to understand the game, but since then, it's been pure fun. The design, game mechanics and writing is great.

Played for hours on the first "level", got killed (due to a mistake with equipping the party) and back to square one. Do not know if I can be bothered putting in the effort again. I really cannot see how you are ever going to get near the even harder levels. Life is too short.

Fun dialogue...challenging...well put together. But inventory needs work...badly. Just drop less loot. Element system and monster system is not done well. Visually tricky and I hate min max my weapons to fight bosses. If on PC id give 6/10 but on Android still 5/5 compared to competition.

This game perfectly mimics the look and performance of the PC version of the game. The touch elements though sadly do not respond to the S Pen, that vaguely annoyed me enough to refund as I like using the S Pen to interact with my games.
It`s just no fun to play. The idea is great and the game play is nice and old school. Unfortunatly the difficulty is set way too high right off the bat making the game no fun.

The game itself looks great, but you don't seem to be able to prevent screen rotation even when the device has it switched off, makes if impossible to play when lying down, a small thing but irittating.
Great game but PLEASE enable Full Screen Immersive Mode!
Waiting time 5/5
Way too hard.
Still freezes at "loading" screen on my asus k00e.
game is fun except for the inability to turn around and the backpack is too small considering its a group of three
Awesome!.
Fun, addicting, mobile rpg. Worth it.

Saw this on steam a little while back and wishlisted it there.  Glad I did because this is an AMAZING mobile game. It is very much suited to a grab and go style of game that I don't usually associate with pc. Seems very complete and full featured.  Easy learning curve and very rewarding.  Couldn't recommend any higher.
Very fun and classic style, funny dialogue. Just dont like how you cant turn around and that the whole game resets when you die.
Awesome!
Game is fun to play. Inexpensive and well done. I also enjoy that it plays landscape or portrait, one handed games are hard to find.
No way to grind, no way to go back town once in dungeon, punishing difficulty. Could have been great, notwithstanding the game doesn't play in full screen, but sadly too many downfalls.
But is there NO way to get back to town while in a dungeon??? My bag is full so it won't let me advance... but all I can do is trash items and lose them forever.
For every party death, give small bonuses to future parties.   Each grave could indicate the bonuses, such as 11% more INT for getting far with a mage group. It would add to replay value!

chars.keep getting hit by status effects and i have to waste every turn trying to heal. no way to retreat. are there any areas to grind in? what about full screen? im still going to keep trying,i just wish it were a little easier.
This game is great. Thanks for adding portrait mode too!

It doesn't make sense that when I outnumber the enemy 3 to 1 that each side still gets one attack. Why can't it just be every character attacks once per round, and then it starts a new round? The game is great otherwise and I was enjoying the difficulty, that is until the boss started stunning my entire team with one move and me able to free one per round only for him to keep doing it. That really made me hate the one attack thing. It doesn't make sense in any way I can think of.
One of the most creative games out here as far as rpgs. Show the developer support
Game won't get past Loading Version 1.352 screen.
replyContent: Hey Mark, please drop us a mail to support@headupgames.com and we'll try to figure out the issue.

content: Excellent game hands down.  Seems to encourage min - maxing all characters, but there are many classes leading to nearly endless replayability.
Good humor, fun gameplay, classic feel - what's not to love?!
I like, but not so much
I can play this game continuously and keep going back to it because the style you play is constantly changing. It has great replay value, but is very unforgiving.
Fun, has personality
It is sick
Difficulty is just right. Well worth the price for the amount of time I put into it. The only problem is I want more.
Why does Mustachio not have his own game?
If you like managing a dozen annoying status effects this is the game for you.
Boring with little agency. Too expensive

It is very addictive. I miss the option to restore a failed game, but I suppose it gives more weight when you actually beat a campaign. Tip: do not attack Death until your party can take a ton of damage and survive. I've learned it the hard way: I was one quest away from beating the first campaign with no deaths and the all-healing party (for achiev) when Death did what it does best.
Had Bob Marley in party. ðŸ‘ðŸ’¨
Best game I have played in a long time
I can't read text as well on my Verizon tablet. Bummer because it looked cool and was a little pricey for a game that doesn't work:) when you get it updated I'll review again;)

I've enjoyed most of my time playing it but it's just missing some openness. Third quest in. Just starting to like my group. First encounter my dwarf is wiped out due to a freak status effect role. And I realize there's no way to abandon a mission. Even before the dungeon. Literally right next to the town. So because of that I have to march the surviving members to their doom. Game desperately needs a mechanism to retreat. Make the players fight back to town. Risk/Reward. Point of no return. Something.

Don't let the price tag set you back this game has it all. Turn based combat rogue like encounters loot drops funny commentary and cameos. Exited the town on my first quest and encountered death literally the first encounter and I decide to attack him learning from my mistake.... He had one shot my whole party and brought them to his realm forever..... 11/10 would play 30 more hours in one sitting.

Like some have said, it's hard, to me at least, but that's why it's fun and worth the money. The only complaint is also as some have stated, you can't quit the game from the game itself, you have to task kill it from the menu button on my phone and tablet. Lollipop 5.0 and 5.0.2..both Samsung devices. Great game guys!

Been playing for a couple of weeks and still my game of choice. Very challenging but well balanced difficulty. There's depth to the game that needs to be learnt in order to progress. Still haven't finished the first campaign.
Best new pixel-based rpg for mobile devices.
Sounds like a great game but cannot play because speech text is not there

Great game. Hoping for a better balancing system for magic resistance. Insane the only way to defeat some foes that are highly magic resistant after you physical fight dies is to throw away one of your tomes and start punching them back and forth for an hour only to have the next three rooms filled with nothing but magic users. Solution would simply be to cap magic resistance to still give at leave some damage.
This is how games used to be and I love it, it can be difficult at times but unlike other games once you buy it you get all it has to offer. No stupid in-app purchases
This game is a nice time waster, but a bit shallow in the sense that an optimal party is usually needed to survive the later stages.
DAT GAME FUN!
Hard but good. Love this game

I really liked this for awhile. Great little game. My only gripe is that you can't choose whatever party you want. If you don't get the draw you want, you can only reroll a new party so many times. So then you get stuck using classss you don't like. Other than that it was fantastic.
Very very entertainment. Haha laughed so hard haha. GreetZ @ DD u #aafface

The game looks great, but without text the game becomes impossible to understand and not fun.  Customer service is amazing, promptly responding to bug report (thus the increase from 1 star to 3 stars). If this bug is corrected, the review will change
Sick game and pretty tough but once you get the right team everything will smooth right out
Truly awsome! Thank you, for your hard work.
Really love this game, definitely worth the money, simple to play, humor, very laid back n exciting at the same time.  Great job!! Thank you for this game
The game looks great, but it is currently unplayable on an Asus K01A. The conversation text will not render making the game incomprehensible.
replyContent: Hi Dan, thanks for your review. We'll have a look at that issue and hopefully will be able to fix it within the next update. Best regards, Team Headup

content: Kinda tough, but fun!
Like the game but on galaxy s3 cant close it without going to task manager. Save and exit brings me to main screen which im stuck on
replyContent: Hi Mike, thanks for your review. We'll add the functionality to close the game with the back-button within the next update. Best regards, Team Headup

content: I love indie not pay to keep playing
Lovee this game, so good. Feels a bit easy for a roguelike though, im only on the default difficulty though.

Death speaks in all caps!  Turtles all the way down!  This game is witty and super fun.  The item system takes some getting used to and I have no idea how you're supposed to do a party without a healer but I'm digging the hefty difficulty.  Challenging, but great!

Pixel Heroes offers a taste of the rougelike genre by giving its players little bits and pieces of the usual ingredients such as permadeath and random loot, and stuffs it all in a neat little casual-flavored wrap. It's a satisfying snack for bite-sized gaming on the side.

Probably the best pixilated adventure on the market.  Truly awesome, must have been a terror to Code but ohhhhh man its very well done.... havent found any glitches.  Its adamantium!!!  Good job Dev!!

I absolutely loved the PC version of the game and only worried about the controls with android, but with my HTC One X+ it works perfectly, so if you also worry about that, it's not an issue! Otherwise, well worth the 7â‚¬, hours of fun, autosave after each battle so no problem if the battery leaves you. If you like round based fights, this game offers it with a relatively complex system, difficulty is challenging but fair. I'm looking forward to many more hours with this game! :)

Would be nice if immersive mode could be added to hide the navigation buttons on phones with onscreen buttons. Also, how do you exit the game properly? I can get back to title screen but after that all I can do is hit the home button on my phone.
Simple game, but lots of replay-ability. Great sense of humour too.  Recommended
Lots of fun, seems like just the right game length although I haven't been able to beat it yet. Lots of randomly generated loot with fun modifiers. Worth the $7 IMO

Great port of the new PC game and one heck of a roguelike.  Your party members WILL die, and it will suck, but the quest must go on.  Loads of hours of my life are to be lost forever and I couldn't be happier.  Basically it's a cutesy equivalent of Darkest Dungeon.  This game is hilarious. I love the ganja smoking Herbalist who heals my party with the power of pot.  Very funny.
Great game!
